# clearGLContext()

**Instance Method**

Releases the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLContext] object associated with the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func clearGLContext()
```

## Discussion

If necessary, this method calls the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLContext/clearDrawable()] method of the context object before releasing it.

## Managing the NSOpenGLContext

- **prepareOpenGL()**: Used by subclasses to initialize OpenGL state.
- **openGLContext**: The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLContext] object associated with the receiver.
